description: This file defines an abstract Java class 'MessageCodeProducer' which extends 'CodeProducer' and implements 'TemplateMappings'. It includes methods for retrieving message dependencies based on certain processing stages and language requirements, specifically related to IPC message generation. The class seems to serve as a base for generating code related to messaging protocols, possibly for native and Java communication.

classes.name: MessageCodeProducer
classes.description: An abstract class that serves as a base for generating IPC message code for Java and native languages, providing methods to identify message dependencies based on language and section context.

methods.name: getMessageDependencies
methods.description: Retrieves an iterator over wrappers that are dependencies for messages, filtered by whether native code is targeted.

methods.name: scanWrappersForDependencies
methods.description: Populates a list with wrappers that match section and language criteria, used internally by getMessageDependencies.
